name: Where is data stored at Tivian?
title: Where is data stored at Tivian?
body:
Overview

This article provides information about where Tivian stores its data, focusing on the security and certification of its data center in Frankfurt, Germany.

 

Information

This guide explains the location and security measures of Tivian's data storage facility, highlighting its compliance with stringent data protection standards.

 

  • Data Storage Location
  • Security and Certification

 

Data Storage Location

Tivian stores its data at the company's server center located in Frankfurt, Germany. This facility is designed to provide reliable protection against unauthorized third-party access.

 

Security and Certification

The data center in Frankfurt is BSI-certified and adheres to extremely stringent data protection and security standards. Key points about the security and certification include:

  • Compliance with ISO 27001 standards
  • Based on the German IT baseline protection standard (IT-Grundschutz)
  • Utilizes the same standard used by German government bodies
  • Certification awarded following an audit by an ISO 27001 baseline protection auditor
  • The auditor is certified by the German Federal Office for Information Security (BSI)

 

FAQ

Where does Tivian store its data?

Tivian stores its data at the company's server center in Frankfurt, Germany.

How secure is Tivian's data storage?

Tivian's data center is BSI-certified and complies with ISO 27001 standards and the German IT baseline protection standard. It is subject to extremely stringent data protection and security measures.

Is Tivian's data storage certified by any authorities?

Yes, the data center is certified following an audit conducted by an ISO 27001 baseline protection auditor who is certified by the German Federal Office for Information Security (BSI).
